cond_sn2_dmso_rt.name: SN2 in DMSO at Room Temperature
cond_sn2_dmso_rt.workup: quench with water, extract EtOAc, dry MgSO4
cond_sn2_dmso_rt.notes: Increase nucleophile eq for hindered cases
cond_sn2_dmso_rt.safety_notes: DMSO is hygroscopic, handle in fume hood

cond_e2_etoh_rt.name: E2 in Ethanol at Room Temperature
cond_e2_etoh_rt.workup: quench with water, extract Et2O, dry Na2SO4
cond_e2_etoh_rt.notes: Use excess base for complete conversion

cond_da_heat.name: Diels-Alder with Heating
cond_da_heat.notes: High temperature often required for good yields
cond_da_heat.safety_notes: High temperature reaction, use proper heating

cond_esterification.name: Esterification with DCC
cond_esterification.workup: filter, wash with NaHCO3, dry MgSO4
